hero-section.first-subheader: Welcome to dataviz: small collection of charts designed to compare various data from all over the world.
hero-section.second-subheader: Every chart on this website was created using D3.js, a popular JavaScript library for producing dynamic, interactive data visualizations in web browsers.
hero-section.quote: The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see.

youtube-channels.title: Most Popular YouTube Channels
youtube-channels.teaser: Top 50 largest channels by the number of subscribers. Comparison by language, country and content category.

james-bond-films.title: James Bond Films
james-bond-films.teaser: Comparison of all films about Agent 007 by budget spent and box office. Let's take a look at the most popular actor, director and most successful film.
